mmemme United Nations maka ibelata ihe ọkụkụ sitere na igbutu osisi na mbibi nke oke ọhịa (ma ọ bụ UN-Mmemme REDD) bụ mmemme imekọ ihe ọnụ nke nzukọ nri na ọrụ ugbo nke United Nations (FAO), mmemme mmepe United Nations (UNDP) na gburugburu mba dị n'otu mmemme gburugburu ebe obibi (UNEP) emebere na 2008 na nzaghachi mkpebi UNFCCC na atụmatụ mmemme Bali yana REDD na COP13.. E kwesịghị ịgbagwoju ya anya na REDD +, usoro mgbochi mgbanwe ihu igwe nke ndị otu UNFCCC mepụtara (lee n'okpuru #Difference n'etiti REDD+ na UN-REDD Programme).
